bugprone-bad-signal-to-kill-thread.description:
Description

Finds
pthread_kill
function calls when a thread is terminated by
raising
SIGTERM
signal and the signal kills the entire process, not
just the individual thread. Use any signal except
SIGTERM
.

pthread_kill
(
thread
,
SIGTERM
);

This check corresponds to the CERT C Coding Standard rule
POS44-C. Do not use signals to terminate threads
.

cert-pos44-c
redirects here as an alias of this check.
